contentList.content: You have honed your body and magic for war. After you cast a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag>, you can make a weapon attack using a bonus action, or vice versa.

Your next weapon attack costs a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag>. This attack can lead up to any <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack(s)</LSTag> you may have.
Your next <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag> costs a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag>.
You have used your War Magic for this turn.
